project01.description: Inherited another team's code and was required to review and integrate new functionality on top. This helped solidify the requirement to read and comprehend code, regardless of the writer(s).
project01.title: Bozo University

project02.description: This project focused on dynamically updating elements within the DOM while organizing code into specific components. With this project, I also focused on making it mobile friendly utilizing media queries to support multiple different formats based on viewport size.
project02.title: Bear Watcher

project03.description: After a lot of generic Bootstrap styling, this project required me to use no styling framework, instead relying on custom Sass to provide any required styling. Additionally, this was an initial start at working with grid styling. While very basic, it reinforced the need to understand exactly everything a CSS framework does behind the scenes for you.
project03.title: Simple Tamagotchi

project04.description: This project was one of the firt group projects we embarked on. This required coordination on which team member was working on which feature, as well as our initial dive into Javascript (looping, updating the DOM, and handling form data), Bootstrap, and Github Projects.
project04.title: Pi√±a Culotte-a
